about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Simple. Clear. Independent. – That's HYPOTEQ.
about.description: We are your partner for smart real estate financing in Switzerland. With our digital platform, you gain access to a variety of verified financing partners. We help you understand mortgage offers more easily and make informed decisions. With structured processes and personal support, we guide you through the most important steps of your financing. You keep the overview – we support in the background. No hidden costs, no obligation – only transparency and efficiency.

homeEvaluation.title: Property Valuation
homeEvaluation.description: Discover the true market value of your property – quickly, precisely and independently. In just a few steps, you'll receive a well-founded valuation and an interactive location analysis. HYPOTEQ uses the proven valuation tool from Wüest Partner, the leading Swiss experts for hedonic property valuations based on real market data.

hypotheken.title: Mortgages Made Easy
hypotheken.description: We are your partner for smart real estate financing in Switzerland. Our digital platform connects you with verified financing partners and makes mortgage offers easy to compare. With clear processes and personal support, we guide you from the first step to completion – transparent, efficient and non-binding. Our DNA - We simplify the mortgage process in Switzerland – digital, smart and close to people. With technology, data and a strong partner network, we make financing faster, clearer and more accessible. For customers, brokers and lenders.
hypotheken.newMortgageDesc: The first step is simple. Start with a brief, non-binding inquiry. To get started, we need information about the property, budget, income and your timeline. No fees. No pressure. You can upload everything directly with us and start your mortgage inquiry, or we can help you by phone.
hypotheken.refinancingDesc: We check affordability, creditworthiness and framework conditions – and show you if there are better options.
hypotheken.newConstructionDesc: For your construction project, you need financing that truly fits you. We analyze your profile, compare the best offers, and explain all options clearly. This way, you make your decision relaxed and based on clear data.

calculator.title: Mortgage Calculator
calculator.description: In just 3 steps to your optimal financing – simple, digital, transparent. We compare offers in real-time and show you immediately what really fits. Fast, secure, straightforward.
calculator.helperText: Simply move the sliders for purchase price, own funds, interest rate and term – and see immediately how your monthly costs, interest and total term change. Smart, transparent and in seconds.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.faqDescription: Do you have questions about real estate financing or want to become part of our partner network? In our FAQ you will find answers to the most important questions.
contact.consultationDescription: If your question remains unanswered: Simply fill out the form with some information about your request. We'll review your message and get back to you with the next appropriate step.
contact.successMessage: We have received your message and will contact you soon.

consultation.title: Questions?
consultation.bannerDescription: Our experts explain the financing process, show you suitable options and guide you in your decision-making – personally, clearly and efficiently. In a short conversation, you get exactly the information you need to move forward confidently.

howItWorks.title: How it works - in just three steps to your mortgage
howItWorks.step1Text: Enter your property data, financial information and wishes. HYPOTEQ analyzes your situation and shows you available mortgage options from over 30 banks and lenders in real-time.
howItWorks.step2Text: See exactly what your mortgage costs - with detailed calculations for different scenarios. Compare interest rates, fees and conditions and decide informally.
howItWorks.step3Text: Start now in just 3 steps - we guide you safely through each step.
howItWorks.highlightText: Start now in just 3 steps - we guide you safely through each step.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Satisfied customers share their experiences
testimonials.testimonial1: Hypoteq's neutral advice brought us several attractive financing offers. Thanks to HYPOTEQ, everything was handled smoothly – and we learned: Good documentation leads to better offers.
testimonials.testimonial2: I am thrilled with the first-class service from HYPOTEQ AG: friendly, competent and always helpful. My concerns were processed quickly, I felt well-informed and supported – absolutely recommendable!
testimonials.testimonial3: Hypoteq guided me through an intensive process in a highly professional, personable and competent manner to achieve a perfect result with top conditions. If you want real professionals by your side, these two are exactly right.
testimonials.testimonial4: We were completely satisfied with the services of Hypoteq AG. Our consultant supported us optimally throughout the entire process and was very present for all questions.
testimonials.testimonial5: HYPOTEQ is the gateway to the financing world for me as an intermediary. Where my knowledge ends, HYPOTEQ helps me to advise my clients optimally.
testimonials.testimonial6: Attentive advisors and regular communication enable a targeted approach and the creation of offers tailored to the needs of customers.
testimonials.testimonial7: Not only are customers in good hands with Hypoteq, but also the affiliated partners. For any changes, even with existing customers, we are guided through all processes, which provides security for everyone. Availability by phone or email is guaranteed even after normal office hours. TOP

advisory.title: HYPOTEQ Advisory
advisory.subtitle: The path to the right financing doesn't have to be complicated - even with more complex projects.
advisory.description: With our paid Advisory service, you get access to expert analysis, targeted structuring and suitable financing partners. We help you create clarity, evaluate options and implement solutions that go beyond standard solutions.
advisory.card1Text: Even in retirement, there are ways to finance – whether refinancing, expansion, or releasing equity. We analyze your pension situation, assets, and goals and show you models that fit your life stage – with planning security and foresight.
advisory.card2Text: Multi-family houses, mixed-use properties, or yield-oriented investments? We know the requirements and guide you through valuation, structuring, and discussions with specialized lenders. Transparent, feasible, professional.
advisory.card3Text: Rejected by the bank? No reason to give up. We analyze your case, identify realistic options, and open access to financing partners with more flexibility – no standard template, but with a clear plan.
advisory.card4Text: Multiple owners, legal entities, foreign participation? No problem. We bring structure to the dossier, clarify responsibilities, and work together to develop a financing model that convinces lenders and works for you.
advisory.step1: You book a free initial consultation with an Advisory expert.
advisory.step2: We analyze your situation and send you a quote for a HYPOTEQ Advisory mandate.
advisory.step3: We support you in implementation - from quote comparison to contract negotiation.

impressum.title: Imprint
impressum.privacy1Title: 1. Collection, processing and use of personal data
impressum.privacy1Text: We do not collect any personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is only collected if you provide it to us yourself via our contact or inquiry form. This data is used exclusively to answer your request.
impressum.privacy2Text: When certain pages are accessed, a so-called 'session cookie' is set. This is a small text file that is automatically deleted from your computer after the end of the browser session.
impressum.privacy3Text: As with any connection to a web server, our hosting provider's server logs and stores certain technical data.
impressum.privacy4Text: This website uses Google Analytics, a web analysis service of Google Inc. Google Analytics uses cookies to analyze website usage.
impressum.privacy5Text: You have the rights to access, correction, deletion, restriction, data portability, withdrawal, and objection.

With well-thought-out tools, a broad network of financing partners and personal advice, we accompany you step by step. You compare offers, see at a glance what suits you – and make informed decisions backed by real professionals.
stats.stat1Desc: Partner banks – more choice and better conditions for you.

yourAdvantages.title: Your advantages with HYPOTEQ
yourAdvantages.card1Title: Easy & fast to the best financing
yourAdvantages.card1Text: Your path to homeownership doesn't have to be complicated. HYPOTEQ compares offers from various financing partners and immediately shows you which solution suits you. Fast, transparent and completely digital.
yourAdvantages.card2Text: Compare offers from multiple financing partners. This way you find the financing that really suits you – with fair conditions and no hidden costs.
yourAdvantages.card3Text: With HYPOTEQ you always know where you stand. No hidden fees, no window dressing rates – just fair, comprehensible offers and honest advice.

mortgageGuide.title: Your Mortgage Guide
mortgageGuide.description: Everything about your real estate financing – simply explained, transparent and to the point. Make the right decisions for your mortgage.

partnerExpect.title: What to expect from us:
partnerExpect.item1Text: The customer relationship belongs to you. We work in the background – you remain the central contact person.
partnerExpect.item2Text: Our margins are higher than traditional brokers – and you receive fair commission per closing.
partnerExpect.item3Text: Our partner portal supports you with consulting, data capture and quote requests – structured, fast and understandable. You guide customers through the key steps, we handle the analysis and obtain suitable financing proposals from our partners. All without direct bank interfaces – but with personal support and clear communication.
partnerExpect.item4Text: Through our system you can create well-founded market assessments for your clients in just a few minutes – real added value for sales, purchases or financing.
partnerExpect.item5Text: Do you have questions about files, documents or scenarios? Our team is at your side – by email or phone. No hotline, no bot.

partnerWerden.title: Would you like to actively broker mortgages and work with HYPOTEQ?
partnerWerden.subtitle: We look forward to hearing from you!
partnerWerden.requirement: To become a partner, you should be a registered company with a valid brokerage license, comply with regulatory requirements (e.g. KYC/AML) and already have experience in operational business – or operate under the supervision of a licensed organization.
partnerWerden.faq1Q: Who can become a HYPOTEQ partner?
partnerWerden.faq1A: Trustees, wealth managers, real estate agents and brokers who want to expand their offering with professional mortgage consulting – without their own bank contract.
partnerWerden.faq2Q: What are the benefits of a partnership with HYPOTEQ?
partnerWerden.faq2A1: As a partner, you benefit from attractive margins, a fair commission structure, fast payments, digital tools and personal support – all without product competition.
partnerWerden.faq2A2: You strengthen customer loyalty and expand your offering without additional administrative effort.
partnerWerden.faq3A1: You remain in the lead: The customer relationship belongs to you, while HYPOTEQ
partnerWerden.faq3A2: You provide the consulting, we handle the analysis, obtain offers from our partner banks and accompany you to completion.
partnerWerden.faq4Q: What tools are available to me as a partner?
partnerWerden.faq4A1: As a sales partner, you can submit credit applications via our website, use the funnel, schedule appointments, ask questions and use our digital tools such as the mortgage calculator or property valuation (available from December 2025) – simple, efficient and transparent.
partnerWerden.faq4A2: There is no separate login or protected area – you use our online tools directly via the website.
partnerWerden.faq5Q: How does my clientele benefit from the partnership with HYPOTEQ?
partnerWerden.faq5A1: Through our network of more than 30 lenders, we compare the best financing solutions on the market for your clients –
partnerWerden.faq5A2: You remain the main contact person and offer real added value, while we structure and support the right financing in the background.

dna.title: Our DNA
dna.description: We simplify the mortgage process in Switzerland – digital, smart and close to people. With technology, data and a strong partner network, we make financing faster, clearer and more accessible. For customers, brokers and lenders.
dna.missionDesc: We make the path to the right mortgage simple, efficient and understandable. With intuitive tools, a broad partner network and personal advice, we help you compare offers, find suitable solutions and make informed decisions.
dna.visionDesc: We create a platform where technology meets trust. Clarity instead of bureaucracy. Efficiency instead of waiting times. Decisions that make a real difference for all participants in the mortgage market.
dna.valuesDesc: We stand for openness, reliability and partnership on equal footing. We act transparently, think long-term and develop every day – as a team and together with our customers.
dna.driveDesc: We bring people, partners and processes together to make mortgages simpler, fairer and smarter. With digital solutions, personal support and a clear goal: to offer you the best path to suitable financing.

mezzanine.title: Mezzanine
mezzanine.subtitle: Capital with flexibility.
mezzanine.description: When traditional bank financing is not enough, mezzanine capital creates additional room to maneuver. Whether a new construction project, acquisition, or growth step – this financing layer closes the gap between equity and debt, without you having to give up shares. Flexible, complementary, and deployable exactly where traditional financing models reach their limits.
mezzanine.whatIsDesc: A flexible form of financing that sits between bank loans and equity. It is subordinated to traditional mortgages but takes priority over shareholder capital. Mezzanine is structured as a loan with interest and profit participation – individually and project-based.
mezzanine.whenUsefulItem1: You need additional capital but don't want to dilute your ownership.
mezzanine.whenUsefulItem2: The bank only covers part of the project – your equity isn't enough.
mezzanine.whenUsefulItem3: You want to act quickly – e.g., for acquisitions, bridge financing, or reorganizations.
mezzanine.howWorksIntro: The structure is flexible – for example:
mezzanine.howWorksItem1: Subordinated loans with fixed or variable interest rates
mezzanine.howWorksItem2: Bullet repayment or with light amortization
mezzanine.howWorksItem5: Always tailored to project, risk, and time horizon
mezzanine.makePossibleDesc: We connect you with suitable capital partners – discreetly, solution-oriented, and efficiently. Whether developer, family office, or portfolio holder – we provide access to mezzanine capital so you can realize your project. Our approach is analytical – we analyze your financing situation and find the ideal partner.

howItWorksSteps.step1Desc: Enter the key details about your property, income, and equity. You'll immediately see if affordability and equity are sufficient for financing. Fast, easy, and non-binding.
howItWorksSteps.step2Desc: Upload the required documents (e.g., salary statement, tax return, land register extract). Once everything is complete, we'll start the process and get the best bank offers for you.
howItWorksSteps.step3Desc: Within 48–72 hours after receiving all documents, you'll receive your personal offers – transparent, comparable, and tailored to your profile. With one click, you can accept or decline the desired offer.
howItWorksSteps.step4Desc: After your selection, we take care of coordination with the bank and accompany you until completion.

faqItems.q1: How does a mortgage inquiry work at HYPOTEQ?
faqItems.a1_intro: There are two ways to request financing from us:
faqItems.a1_definitive_text: If you want concrete financing offers from our network of over 30 lenders, please choose the 'Mortgage Request' section and submit all relevant information and documents. Once the dossier is complete, we obtain binding offers from suitable lending partners.
faqItems.a1_indicative_text: If you only want an initial assessment or indicative rate, you can request indicative offers. Based on a few basic details (income, property, loan-to-value, etc.), you'll receive non-binding guideline prices. These offers are indicative and subject to complete review of your documents and final credit approval by the financing partner.
faqItems.a2_p1: Our service is generally free for customers. We are compensated by the financing partners once a mortgage is concluded.
faqItems.a2_p2: If we obtain definitive offers at your request and you decide against us despite equivalent or worse competing offers, we reserve the right to charge a processing fee of CHF 500.–. This ensures that the extensive analysis and offer procurement is fairly compensated.
faqItems.q3: What types of financing does HYPOTEQ offer?
faqItems.a3_intro: We offer financing for private individuals, self-employed, and legal entities in the following areas:
faqItems.a3_item2: New mortgage for purchase or property acquisition
faqItems.a3_note: (No commercial properties, except within the framework of mezzanine structures.)
faqItems.q4: How long does it take to receive an offer?
faqItems.a4_indicative_text: within a few hours to a maximum of 1 business day.
faqItems.a4_definitive_text: once all relevant documents are fully available, typically within 2–3 business days. For complex cases (e.g., legal entities, new construction, or mixed-use properties), it may take slightly longer.
faqItems.q5: Why is my loan application taking longer than expected?
faqItems.a5_p1: Processing time depends heavily on the completeness of documents, the complexity of the case, and the internal review processes of the banks.
faqItems.a5_p2: Delays often occur when evidence is missing or clarifications are needed – particularly for self-employed, new construction, legal entities, or refinancings.
faqItems.a5_p3: With a complete dossier and clear information, the process can be significantly accelerated.
faqItems.q6: What documents do I need for a definitive offer?
faqItems.a6_p1: You can find the complete document list via the following link:
faqItems.a6_p2: Alternatively, you can fill out our online funnel – at the end of the process, a list of all required documents will be automatically displayed, tailored to your situation.
faqItems.q7: Which banks does HYPOTEQ work with?
faqItems.a7_p1: We work with a broad network of over 30 banks, insurance companies, and alternative lenders in Switzerland.
faqItems.a7_p2: This allows us to compare independently and objectively and find the best possible solution for every customer.
faqItems.q8: What is the difference between HYPOTEQ and a bank?
faqItems.a8_p1: HYPOTEQ is not a lender, but an independent mortgage broker. We work with over 30 banks, insurance companies, and alternative financing partners.
faqItems.a8_p2: This distinguishes us from a traditional bank in the following ways:
faqItems.a8_item1_text: We compare offers from different banks – a bank only offers its own products.
faqItems.a8_item2_text: Through comparison, customers often benefit from lower interest rates and better terms.
faqItems.a8_item3_text: Instead of talking to multiple banks, you conduct the entire conversation only with us.
faqItems.a8_item4_text: We find individual financing solutions – even in more complex cases where banks often don't issue offers.
faqItems.a8_item5_text: We handle the analysis, offer procurement, and negotiations with lending partners.
faqItems.a8_summary: In short: Banks sell mortgages. HYPOTEQ compares mortgages and finds the best solution for you.
faqItems.q9: How can I schedule an appointment directly?
faqItems.a9_p1: You can book a non-binding 15-minute appointment with one of our financing experts at any time – conveniently online via our appointment booking link.
faqItems.a9_p2: The conversation is free and serves to briefly analyze your situation and plan the next steps.
faqItems.a10_p1: HYPOTEQ Advisory is aimed at customers with more complex financing needs. With our paid advisory mandate, you gain access to in-depth analysis, targeted structuring, and individual solutions – beyond standard offers.
faqItems.a10_item2: Complex properties (e.g., multi-family houses, mixed-use properties)
faqItems.a10_item5: Ownership structures with multiple parties or legal entities
faqItems.a10_step1: You book a free initial consultation with an Advisory expert.
faqItems.a10_step2: We analyze your situation and create an offer for an Advisory mandate.
faqItems.a10_step3: We accompany you through implementation – from offer comparison to contract negotiation.
faqItems.a10_p2: The Advisory service is paid, but offers real added value: deep market knowledge, personal support, and tailored financing solutions.
faqItems.q11: How can I request mezzanine financing?
faqItems.a11_p1: A flexible form of financing between bank loans and equity. It is subordinated to traditional mortgages but has priority over shareholder capital.
faqItems.a11_when1: When additional capital is needed without diluting ownership.
faqItems.a11_when2: When the bank only finances part of the project.
faqItems.a11_when3: When rapid financing solutions are needed (e.g., acquisitions, bridge financing, project starts).
faqItems.a11_struct1: Subordinated loan with fixed or variable interest
faqItems.a11_p2: We connect you with suitable capital partners – discreetly, solution-oriented, and efficiently.
faqItems.a12_p1: You can reach us via the contact form on the website, by email at
faqItems.a12_p2: or by phone. We're also happy to arrange an appointment – online or in person.

liveChat.askEmail: Could you provide your email address?

liveChat.howCanHelp: How can I help you further?
liveChat.autoReply: Thank you for your message. A team member will get back to you shortly. In the meantime, you can visit our FAQ page.
liveChat.title: HYPOTEQ Support
liveChat.subtitle: Usually responds in a few minutes
liveChat.privacyNotice: We protect your data according to our privacy policy

responses.mortgage: We offer different types of mortgages: SARON mortgage, fixed-rate mortgage, and Libor mortgage. Each has advantages depending on your situation. Which one interests you most?
responses.interestRate: Current interest rates vary based on mortgage type and duration. SARON mortgages are flexible, while fixed-rate mortgages offer planning security. Would you like detailed advice?
responses.calculator: Our mortgage calculator helps you find the best option. You can use it on our calculator page or start directly with the funnel. Which interests you?
responses.documents: For a mortgage, you need: proof of identity, income statements, tax returns, and property information. You'll find a complete list on our documents page.
responses.process: Our process is simple: 1) Online application, 2) Document review, 3) Consultation, 4) Offer creation, 5) Contract signing. The entire process typically takes 2-4 weeks.
responses.costs: Our services are free for you. We receive a commission from lenders. However, notary and land registry fees may apply.
responses.contact: You can reach us by email, phone, or through our contact form. Our advisors are available Monday to Friday 9am-6pm.
responses.default: That's a good question! I recommend speaking with one of our experts to get a detailed answer.
responses.furtherHelp: For further assistance, please visit our
